caption:
The photograph captures an industrial setting situated in a rugged landscape. The foreground of the image features some shrubbery and earth tones, overlooking an expansive plant facility. This plant consists of various structures including several large metal silos, a tall chimney, connecting walkways and some factory-like buildings with large metal roofs. Different parts of the plant are connected through a series of metal conduits and staircases, accentuating its industrial nature.

The background reveals a broader landscape with gently rolling hills that are relatively barren, indicating a semi-arid or arid climate. The hills stretch out into the distance under a clear blue sky. The lighting suggests the photograph was taken during the day, and the shadows indicate a time either in early morning or late afternoon, giving the colors a warm, vibrant quality.

Overall, the image portrays a mix of industrial activity set against a natural, perhaps even somewhat remote, backdrop that contrasts the man-made elements with the natural terrain.
title: Anvil Points Research Center, a government facility, has been leased to Development Engineering Inc. which will test a new kind of retorting (distilling by heat) process to extract the oil from oil shale.
